item.title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin closed beta test set for October 30 to November 5
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5

Additional recruitment event currently running.

The closed beta test for free-to-play open-world action RPG The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin will run from October 30 to November 5, publisher Netmarble and developer Netmarble F&C announced.

Applications for the closed beta test ended on October 19, but Netmarble is holding an additional recruitment event through October 24, offering users another chance to join the test. Details are available on the official website.

The Seven Deadly Sins: Origin is due out for PlayStation 5, PC via Steam, iOS, and Android on January 28, 2026.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/the-seven-deadly-sins-origin-closed-beta-test-set-for-october-30-to-november-5

item.title: VTuber Dokugai Chinami visual novel Chinami Holic announced for PS4, Switch, PC, iOS, and Android
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • Smartphone
  • Switch

Due out on January 22, 2026 in Japan.

CyberStep visual novel game brand Rabbitfoot has announced Chinami Holic for PlayStation 4, Switch, PC, iOS, and Android. It will launch first for Switch and PC via Steam, BOOTH, and DLsite on January 22, 2026.

Chinamic Holic is a fully voiced novel game starring Virtual YouTuber Dokugai Chinami. It will support English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, and other language options to be announced.

In addition to the digital release, the following physical editions will be available for PC:

  • Kids Edition (9,900 yen) – Hides sensitive scenes from the main story and can be enjoyed by a wider age range
    • Original design USB (game included)
    • A5-size acrylic file
    • Acrylic stand
    • Digital bonuses (situation voice / illustration data collection / PC and smartphone wallpapers)
    • Available at retailers across Japan
  • Limited Edition (13,200 yen)
    • Original design USB (game included)
    • Art book
    • A5-size acrylic panel (using CG from the main story)
    • A5-size acrylic file
    • Acrylic stand
    • Digital bonuses (situation voice / illustration data collection / PC and smartphone wallpapers)
    • Available via BOOTH / CyberStep Shop
  • Yours-Only Box (39,600 yen) – A custom-made version of the game in which the name of the protagonist is re-recorded with the name requested by the buyer, making it a game made just for you
    • Limited edition contents
    • 3D mousepad
    • Available via BOOTH

Here is the story synopsis:

“Call me Chinami. We’re a couple, after all.”

You’re living a lovey-dovey life with live streamer Dokugai Chinami. Despite your busy schedules, you always find time to go on fun dates together. And after the dates, you will travel together, and then… after that…

…Huh? Come to think of it…

Where did you meet Chinami again?

And here are the first screenshots:

Visit the official website here.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/vtuber-dokugai-chinami-visual-novel-chinami-holic-announced-for-ps4-switch-pc-ios-and-android

item.title: Palworld ‘Halloween’ update launches October 23
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

What "tricks" are brewing in Palworld?

Pocketpair will release a Halloween-themed update for monster-catching open-world survival crafting game Palworld on October 23, the developer announced.

Here is an overview of the update, via Pocketpair:

Halloween is coming to Palworld!

Rumor has it that Zoe’s been spotted in a rather unusual new outfit…

But that’s not the only mystery. Something strange is happening to the adorable Pal Depresso. Reports have come in of mysterious figures roaming the Palpagos Islands, dressed in what appear to be Depresso costumes!

What could be going on…?

Stay tuned for more details coming soon, and keep an eye out for whatever “tricks” might be brewing in Palworld!

Thank you, as always, for your continued support of Palworld.

Palworld is available now in Early Access for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store. It is also available via Game Pass. A full launch is planned for 2026.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/palworld-halloween-update-launches-october-23
